original_text: And Judah did evil in the sight of the Lord, and they provoked him to jealousy with their sins which they had committed, above all that their fathers had done.
korean_text: 유다가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그의 조상들이 행한 모든 일보다 뛰어나게 하여 그 범한 죄로 여호와를 노엽게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: And Judah did evil in the sight of the Lord
and they provoked him to jealousy with their sins
above all that their fathers had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 조상들이 행한 모든 것보다 더욱
